title: Louisiana Woos Movie Industry With Tax Credits
teaser: Louisiana has been dubbed "Hollywood South" for the high volume of film production there. Big budget films like "Jurassic World" and "Dawn of the Planet of the Apes" are among the many movies produced in that state. Producers are lured by generous tax credits â€” so plentiful, that there's a big market for those tax credits.
